snippet: Anonymous outpourings of admiration are the driving force of Columbia Compliments, a Facebook page that publishes words of kindness about members of a vast and occasionally alienating university.
abstract: Anonymous outpourings of admiration are the driving force of Columbia Compliments, a Facebook page that publishes words of kindness about members of a vast and occasionally alienating university.

headline.main: Behind the Veil of the Internet, Students Create a World of Affection
headline.print_headline: In Sea of Snark, a Site Built on Kind Words
